title: ملف يلا كورة.. ديربي القاهرة "أهلاوي".. إصابة طاهر.. وتصريحات مدرب الزمالك
summary: نشر يلا كورة مجموعة من الأخبار الهامة على مدار أمس الإثنين لعل أبرز هي فوز الأهلي بالقمة 131 أمام غريمه التقليدي نادي الزمالك.

title: This is the Oppo Hasselblad Professional Teleconverter Kit for the Find X9 Pro
summary: The upcoming Oppo Find X9 Pro is getting a Hasselblad branded camera kit, which will extend its zooming capabilities by a factor of 3.28. title: الفوز الثاني على التوالي.. "عقدة" النحاس تطول الزمالك في القمة 131
summary: واصل عماد النحاس، مدرب الأهلي، تفوقه ضد نادي الزمالك، بعدما حقق فريقه الفوز في القمة 131.

title: One UI 8 arrives on Galaxy Z Flip5, Z Fold5, the Galaxy S23 series, A55 and A35 too
summary: The One UI 8 rollout continues with phones from 2024 and 2023. This is happening ahead of schedule, but right now it appears that only devices in Korea are getting the new OS version. The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5 and Z Flip5 (both from 2023) are joining their 2024 Z siblings in Android 16. This is a …

title: بعد إعادتها.. حسام عبد المجيد يضع الزمالك في المقدمة أمام الأهلي من ركلة جزاء (فيديو)
summary: وضع حسام عبد المجيد، لاعب نادي الزمالك، فريقه في المقدمة أمام الأهلي، من ركلة جزاء نجح مدافع الأبيض في تسديدها بنجاح.

summary: The OnePlus Ace 6 is expected to launch in China alongside the OnePlus 15 next month, and today specs for the Ace 6 have been outed on Weibo. title: vivo Y500 Pro to debut later this year with a 200MP camera

title: Sandisk launches officially licensed SSDs and MicroSD cards for the ROG Xbox Ally series — up to 4TB of storage for new Asus flagship handheld
summary: Sandisk is launching Xbox-branded storage accessories for the new Asus ROG Xbox Ally handheld systems.

title: شيكو بانزا ضمن قائمة منتخب أنجولا لمعسكر أكتوبر

title: YouTube starts rolling out Premium Lite plan in India
summary: YouTube has started rolling out its Premium Lite plan in India. This should allow users to access content with fewer ads and features at a lower starting price compared to the standard Premium plan. title: Mobile RTX 2070 with shunt mod nearly eclipses desktop performance — 60W boost provides 15% performance uplift
summary: A PC enthusiast reports successfully shunt modding his Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 Mobile GPU for a ~15% performance uplift.

title: كرة سلة.. الزمالك يعلن تمديد عقد خالد عبد الناصر
summary: أعلن مجلس إدارة نادى الزمالك، برئاسة حسين لبيب عن تمديد عقد خالد عبد الناصر، لاعب الفريق الأول لكرة السلة بالقلعة البيضاء لمدة موسمين بخلاف الموسم الحالي، المتبقي في عقده.

title: EA acquired by Saudi Arabian investment fund and others for $55 billion — largest ever buyout of a public company
summary: EA has been acquired for $55 billion.

title: Realme GT 8 runs Geekbench with Snapdragon 8 Elite
summary: Realme will launch the GT 8 series in October with a vanilla and Pro model. The vanilla model has been doing some unofficial testing and results from Geekbench 6.5.0 have surfaced. The Realme GT 8 will be powered by the original Snapdragon 8 Elite, while the Pro model will feature the brand new Sna…

title: Honor MagicPad 3 Pro design and specs leaked
summary: The Honor MagicPad 3 Pro is expected to launch next month in China alongside the Magic8 series. Ahead of the official unveiling, specifications and design of the upcoming tablet have been leaked. Honor MagicPad 3 Pro is confirmed to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. title: Top 10 trending phones of week 39
summary: Fro the third week in a row the 17 Pro Max is on top of our trending chart, except it's a different phone altogether. Xiaomi stole Apple's thunder with its new flagship lineup even though it's yet to debut outside China. The newly unveiled Xiaomi 17 Pro Max ended up the most popular device in our d…

title: The cheapest RTX 5060 laptop is just $999 right now at Best Buy — Get $300 off Lenovo's LOQ 15.6" gaming laptop with a Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and an RTX 5060
summary: If you're looking for a solid gaming laptop that doesn't break the bank, Lenovo has got you covered with the 2025 LOQ 15. It comes with an RTX 5060, Core i7-13650HX, 16GB of RAM and decent battery life. For $999, you can't get better gaming performance with this quality.

title: Acer Predator XB273K V5 27-inch 4K gaming monitor review: Vivid color and dual refresh rate capable
summary: Acer packs a lot of performance and flexibility into its Predator XB273K V5. It’s a 27-inch 4K IPS panel with 160 Hz, 320 Hz in FHD resolution, Adaptive-Sync, blur reduction, HDR10, and wide gamut color. It’s also a great value.

title: Nvidia RTX 5070 Ti Super and RTX 5070 Super TDP leaked — long-rumored RTX 50 Super series GPUs appear in power supply calculator
summary: Nvidia's rumored RTX 50 Super mid-gen refresh has no concrete launch window, but there have already been plenty of leaks. Rumors suggest a CES 2026 announcement, and we now have what appears to be our first substantial confirmation of RTX 50 Super GPUs, courtesy of Seasonic's PSU calculator.

title: Asus addresses stuttering issues plaguing its gaming laptops — beta patch released for ROG laptops, final fix due in October
summary: Asus has begun rolling out beta BIOS updates to address widespread stuttering and performance issues on ROG laptops. The company confirms it has identified the root cause and will release finalized firmware soon.

title: Get massive, speedy HDD storage with Western Digital's 22TB WD Red Pro at just $400 — enjoy 11% off a comparatively fast CMR hard drive
summary: If you've been holding out for your next big purchase to expand your NAS, your wish has been granted. The 22TB WD Red Pro is currently on sale at Amazon for just $400. Add reliable hard drive storage to your collection for a neat discount, while enjoying a 5-year warranty.

title: Enthusiasts bond twelve 56K modems together to set dial-up broadband records — a dozen screeching boxes achieve record 668 kbps download speeds
summary: Can you stream YouTube via dial-up? You'll need at least four bonded 56K modems. But what if you have 12?

title: AMD's memory patent outlining a 'new, improved RAM' made from DDR5 memory isn't a new development — HB-DIMMs already superseded, probably won't come to market
summary: AMD's HB-DIMM concept probably isn't coming to market, as the company has already thrown its support behind the similar JEDEC MRDIMM standard.

title: Acer FA200 4TB SSD Review: A Capacious Retread
summary: The Acer FA200 has nothing wrong with it, having relatively good all-around performance and solid power efficiency. It’s outdated and hard to find, though.

title: Modder takes hacksaw and hot glue to original Xbox to create a gaming handheld — ‘portable monstrosity’ has exposed spinning DVD in the center and plenty of duct tape, but works as intended
summary: James Channel challenged himself to transmogrify the 'biggest, heaviest, power-hungry console anybody had ever seen' into a handheld. He did it. Duct tape and hot glue were very useful.

title: One of our favorite ever 3D printers the Prusa MK4S has dropped to an all-time low of $929 — accurate, fast, and quiet quality prints
summary: Receiving a maximum rating, the Prusa MK4S is one of our favorite printers to hit the test bench. Now discounted to a new low price of $929.
